dialog_1.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_1.text: Well, blast. You've actually done itâ€”broken my curse and ruined my perfectly good entertainment.

dialog_2.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_2.text: Quite impressive, really, especially with that useless gun of yours.

dialog_3.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_3.text: Off you go then, pot-smasher. Try not to get locked in any more dungeons.

dialog_4.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_4.text: The next warden might lack my delightful personality.

dialog_5.name: The Insufferably Charming Imprisoner
dialog_5.text: Farewell, and do avoid any suspicious-looking doors in the future.
